ConceptDef.label: Your Ancestors would like a word!
ConceptDef.helpText:
Welcome to the King of Rimworld Pass mod!

This mod adds Ancestral Spirits, who will visit your colony from time to time and can be petitioned for blessings. Beware angering them, or they can also call down some very unpleasent punishments.

Construct a Shrine Room, preferably with lavish and luxurious deocrations, and your Ancestors will drop in for a visit! Take care not to dally, or they'll grow cross with your lack of respect.

ConceptDef.label: About the Shrine
ConceptDef.helpText:
The Shrine is your Ancestors' Anchor, from which they'll manifest to visit your colony and see how their descendants are getting on.

You should have one and only one Shrine in the colony, or your Ancestors will be very displeased!

You can check your current Magic count by selecting the Shrine, and can petition your Ancestors by selecting a pawn and right-clicking on it. A list of possible petitions will come up. To successfully petition your Ancestors you will have to attach Braziers to the Shrine, as well as have the required Magic.

ConceptDef.label: About Braziers and Petitions
ConceptDef.helpText:
In order to Petition your Ancestors, you will need to spend magic.

The amount of magic spent is equal to the number of attached and lit Braziers. Make sure you check before you start the Petition!

You can spend between double and half the listed magic price. The chance of success at half magic is slightly over half, and at double they will for sure grant your petition. Vary your spend depending on urgency, but overall you will probably have better long-term results by using less on more attempts.

Don't worry about angering them with failed attempts - as long as you don't go insultingly low they won't mind.

ConceptDef.label: About Ancestral Visits
ConceptDef.helpText:
Every so often, your Ancestors will drop in to visit!

They don't need to eat or sleep, but they do get bored sometimes. Mostly they're here just to see the sights! Ugliness and disorder will anger them, but beautiful and rich surroundings will please them.

When your Ancestors return to their Anchor, they will pass judgement on your village. If they're pleased, they will grant you more magic when the season turns. If they're not, you may even lose magic. If they're incredibly displeased you may suffer a curse, so ensure that this does not happen!
